Hihi  is alignment necessary to add on during minor servicing?
I only do standard rotation + balancing
only need do alignment if you see very uneven tyre wear/you hit a pothole or kerb
one way to know for sure is if your steering wheel does not return to straight or the car doesn't stay straight after you let go of steering wheel
but still a good idea to do alignment once every 1-2 years
